notes: This is a brand new modern high-rise apartment (22F/29F) in the Farglory Qingchuan development with excellent finishes - note that images are 3D renderings, not actual photos (室內設計圖 以現場為主 = interior design drawings, actual site may vary). The unit features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious living area (9.31 ping), and two balconies. For baby safety: the balcony has glass railings which need child-proofing, and the floor plan shows a single-level layout with no stairs. Good natural light from large windows visible in living room.
